SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! printing the command formed : PRINT "EXECUTING CMD : &UC4RB_RUN_CMD#"
: SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" call "%WEBLOGIC_HOME%\server\bin\setWLSEnv.cmd" IF %ERRORLEVEL% EQU 0 ( set CLASSPATH=%CLASSPATH%:%OSB_HOME%\lib\sb-kernel-api.jar:%OSB_HOME%\modules\com.bea.common.configfwk_1.7.0.0.jar:%OSB_HOME%\lib\sb-kernel-impl.jar:%OSB_HOME%\lib\alsb.jar &UC4RB_RUN_CMD# ERROR=%ERRORLEVEL% ) : CASE "UNIX" if [ -z != $WEBLOGIC_HOME ] then . $WEBLOGIC_HOME/server/bin/setWLSEnv.sh error=$? if [ $error -eq 0 ] then export CLASSPATH=$CLASSPATH:$OSB_HOME/lib/sb-kernel-api.jar:$OSB_HOME/modules/com.bea.common.configfwk_1.7.0.0.jar:$OSB_HOME/lib/sb-kernel-impl.jar:$OSB_HOME/lib/alsb.jar &UC4RB_RUN_CMD# error=$? fi else echo "WEBLOGIC_HOME is not set" error=1 fi : OTHER : ENDSWITCH
